entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 1 April 2023
